text: Kristina and Karissa Shannon (born October 2, 1989 in Ann Arbor, Michigan) are American twin sisters that works as glamour models. That have been Playboy Playmates working for Playboy founder and owner Hugh Hefner. They also appeared on Hefner's television series The Girls Next Door. They were housemates in Celebrity Big Brother (UK) in 2012. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:Models from Michigan Category:People from Ann Arbor, Michigan Category:Sibling duos Category:Twin people from the United States
title: Kristina and Karissa Shannon
